#summary Template tags available in any template
#labels Phase-Design,Reference-TemplateEngine

= Smarty Variables =
These are pre-packaged with Smarty.

 * {{{ {$SCRIPT_NAME} }}}
    Generates the name of the applicable script (article.php, index.php, etc.)
 * {{{ {$smarty} }}}
    Universal variable to access a variety of objects (Sessions, Cookies, Requests, etc.). See Smarty documentation.

= PacerCMS Config Variables =
These are set by the pacercms.conf file in the {{{ ./includes/Smarty/configs/ }}} directory.

 * {{{ {#language#} }}}
    Language of the system, used in DOCTYPE declaration. Defaults to "en-US". * {{{ {#encoding#} }}}
    Charachter set of the system, used in DOCTYPE declaration. Defaults to "utf-8". * {{{ {#screen_css#} }}}
    Name of the Cascading Stylesheet for screen rendering. Defaults to "style-screen.css". * {{{ {#print_css#} }}}
    Name of the Cascading Stylesheet for printer rendering. Defaults to "style-print.css".

= PacerCMS Set Variables =
These are set in the classes.php file in the {{{ ./includes/ }}} directory.

 * {{{ {$site_name} }}}
    Publlication name stored in the Settings module of the Site Administration system.
 * {{{ {$site_url} }}}
    Web address stored in the Settings module of the Site Administration system.
 * {{{ {$site_description} }}}
    Publlication tagline stored in the Settings module of the Site Administration system.
 * {{{ {$site_sections} }}}
    Associative array of the sections in the Sections module of the Site Administration system.
 * {{{ {$site_template_folder} }}}
    Value stored in the config.php file in the {{{ ./includes/ }}} folder. Typically "default" or "local".
 * {{{ {$site_cm_version} }}}
    Version of PacerCMS stored in the cm-header.php file in {{{ ./includes/ }}} folder.
 * {{{ {$current_issue_date} }}}
    Date in YYYY-MM-DD format of the issue marked "Current Issue".
